alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 7:47PM CDT until March 27 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LOWNDES AND SOUTHEASTERN DALLAS COUNTIES... At 747 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Pine Apple, or 14 miles east of Camden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dannelly Reservoir, Collirene, Tilden, Carlowville, Minter, Farmersville and Fostoria. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
